article:
'John Cooper Wiley' (1893-1967) was a United States
Foreign Service officer and ambassador.

In 1938 he was the ChargÃ© d'Affaires ad interim in Austria and Envoy
Extraordinary and Minister Plenipotentiary to Latvia and Estonia. He went on to
appointments as Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary to Colombia,
Portugal, Iran, and Panama.
categories: Ambassadors of the United States to Colombia
